long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in the eerie allure of Gengar with vivid HD backgrounds that bring its mystical energy to life.

🎨 Minimalist Design: Enjoy a clean and spooky interface inspired by the captivating world of Pokémon.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay on top of your schedule with a sleek, Pokémon-themed time and date display.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Instantly navigate to your favorite sites with seamless shortcuts.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into fun and thrilling Pokémon-inspired games directly from your new tab.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Conduct efficient searches with ease, tailored to your browsing needs.
🚀 More Extension: Discover additional features designed to make your Gengar-inspired browsing unforgettable.
